channel.title: [C+P] Antiposion = Unlimited! In three steps! [C+P]
channel.description:
Ok I made this c/p update because people wanted it .
I asked where c/p tutorials should be , and apparantly they are supposed to be here so...
[hr] STEP ONE:
open client.java and press ctrl+f (search). Now type or paste "case 179" without the quote marks. You should get this: [code] case 179: //Antipoison(1) PoisonDelay = 9999999; sendMessage("You drink the last dose of the antipoison."); deleteItem(179, getItemSlot(179), 1); break; [/code]
That is the case for when an antiposion (1) stops posion in the char and deletes its self Now , we want to stop it deleting itsself so: You see the line: [code] deleteItem(179, getItemSlot(179), 1); [/code]
after that , hit enter and paste this: [code] addItem(2446, 1); [/code]
Fairly simple to understand , your just making the antiposion(1) delete its self and replace itself with an antiposion (4) hehe
Please comment (nicely) and post errors.

@tobias222 wrote:

lololololol everyone who thinks this is a tutorial can just say no more and go back. Because this is not a tutorial and never will be , its purpose is more of an update , ive already FUCKIN explained why I posted it here at least 2 times and everyone is posting the exact same thing… “go to hell” uuggghhh “were not allowed c+p tutorials” uugghhh "

And lastly , I didnt even know a good person would post this:

this does nothing, right when you get poisoned again it goes back down, tbh gtfo noob, secondly, try posting in the tutorial section and explain how it works, oh my bad i forgot, all you did was copy and paste it from your source so you dont know how it works!

I do know what this means
I didnt make the 999999 thing
I dont want any more flamers fucking about here cause theyve nothing else to do.
I get the point you dont understand this c+p update and why its not a tutorial ,
A tutorial is supposed to Teach , not copy and paste
LOOK AT THE ABOVE SENTENCE:
1.work out in your simple mind why I didnt post in the tutorial section
hhmmmmmm … I wonder …
yes ! thats why! its not even a fucking tutorial!
Just because people used to make “tutorials”
